name: Jared R
text: It sad but this location is permanently closed. But now I been going to the one on 340 Howdershell and they are great.

name: Daniel Veloz
text: Very down to earth type staff, places my order with ease and was made to perfection. Would love to go here again and again.

name: Lencie Whitt
text: I ordered zesty cheese bread. It was burnt. I called to see if they can remake it. They said if I didn't have a receipt there was nothing they could do. So I went in asking if it was possible they can reprint receipts. I told him what I ‚Ä¶More

name: Ash M
text: Holy wow, have not had these good of breadsticks from Little Caesars in a long time from the area. This Crew is quick, professional and everything looks bomb and tastes delicious!! We will be coming again often, thanks guys! Great new recipes, Lil Caesars!

name: tammy briggs
text: Non expensive and very well prepared ...crust and toppings are great.. I especially like the one located on Lindbergh

name: Goddess Star
text: I waited a little longer than usual but the girl who helped me apologized for my wait and offered me a marinara sauce complimentary. She was truly multi tasking. While my food was getting cooked/baked she was cleaning. Answering the phones. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathleen Jefferson
text: Great price good food. Love the wings.

name: Karen Lupo
text: Here just before 5p. One customer waiting. Not one pizza made and ready.  No bread made. Tins of people here now. What comes out of the kitchen is wrong.  No one in charge. Really a pathetic show.  Got my money. Never coming here again

name: CJ Zanders
text: They have the Hot and Ready's on deck. Decent service. Thanks. They need to have some professional sign flippers out there to get more business. It would be cool seeing people that actually attract business instead of having kids that don't care.

name: Carl Petee
text: Under new ownership, so the $5 pizzas are now just $5! Sure, it's not the highest quality, but it's cheap and good. Perfect for satisfying a house full of hungry teens. Oh, and the pizza actually has a crust. Not this soda cracker thin St Louis style.

name: Kiran Nicole Buckhannon
text: Phenomenal food incredible service Best Little Caesars in Florissant Hazelwood, and Ferguson

name: Eli Williams
text: Visited this location in the evening time and I think there were only two employees one of them was a young African-American lady who literally made me want to eat here every day. Even though she was the only one who seemingly making pizzas ‚Ä¶More

name: Lou Mccormack
text: Polite,courteous young people work here. A pleasant experience. Very surprised.

name: Dawn Lacy
text: We come here all the time. The staff is usually pleasant and can get the orders out right away. Only reason i didn't give them 5 stars is because its always ridiculously hot and while waiting its uncomfortable. feel bad for the employees.

name: Tanganyika Summerhill
text: It was a great experience but time was an issue

name: Bonita Bethel
text: Hot & ready! Didn't wait very long. Dinner was great!

name: paint strip
text: Called two pizzas in and they told me i could not call in but i could walk in before they closed which makes no sense

name: Brandon C
text: Great food for the price though my crazy bread seemed a bit undercooked... And the cashier was great...

name: Ms. C
text: Courteous and friendly. The prices are great. The pizza's are great. Not greasy like papa John's pizza.

name: Drew Wilson
text: They ok, pizza always Good, service sometimes good.

name: Jason Homes
text: Tried to order a pick up and they where literally playing on the phone and then they hung up! Won‚Äôt get my business again!

name: Carlton Aldridge
text: Extremely bad experience. Employees would not take earbuds out of their ears to take my order. They would scream to the back room for assistance and when no help came left the counter and all the patrons alone in the lobby.

name: Chu Chu
text: One of our orders from the place had gotten burnt and we said well done üôÑ

name: Jay Branch
text: Pizza ok. Nothing fancy, just tasted ok.Had the sausage pizza, very dry.

name: Cassie S
text: Terrible service. 9 times out of 10 they give burnt pizza and crazy bread. would not recommend.

name: Jason George
text: They are supposed to open at 11am.  NEVER OPEN AT 11!  EVER!  I was just there last Friday  6/18/16 and I called because the open sign wasn't on.  She said oh we won't be open until 1 or 1:30.  There goes my lunch.   Has happened over 10 ‚Ä¶More

name: tonio m
text: Pizza is good when it's hot. But they don't always have employees with good customer service skills

name: Alicia Jones
text: Walk in and was immediately turned off. It's dirty here and I could breadsticks on the floor in the back. I ordered a pepperoni pizza and a cheese pizza. We I got it in the car it smelled so weird . Like it was old. I didn't even risk eating it. Save your money and go elsewhere.

name: Travis McDuffie
text: Got my pizza & bread shortly after 12pm, worst I've had from a Little Caesar's yet. Crazy bred FLAT & soaked in grease as well as luke warm. Sauce COLD as in fresh out of the fridge cold. Pizza, barely warm, crust dried out, I had to cut ‚Ä¶More

text: I love their hot n ready and their hot wings are so good.I love this place

name: Erin Grogan
text: Good prices. Has a great cheese combo.

name: Karen Crawford
text: I love there pizza but I wish there was one in Jerseyville, Il.

name: Danita Brown
text: The store manager Dorian is always and i do mean always so polite, courteous and kind. The food is hot every time i order from this store, as long as he is here i will continue to visit this location.

name: TOP 5
text: I left a 3 star review before but now i totally changed my review to a 5 star review i came in today i came and i got greeted the rigth way and i seen the owner working and making sure everything was made good that says alot when a owner cares for the quality of the food and store and pizza tasted great great place to buy ur pizza

text: Truly fast and ready!  The staff here stays on their toes!

name: Amanda Lane
text: The cost here has started to slowly move from inexpensive to moderately expensive. My roommate got food poisoning from his buffalo wings. Not the best experience.

I will never eat another pizza from there again ... when I called to complain all they said was OH WELL SORRY...
